short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fully hide messages and threads from blocked Discord users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discord's blocking is strange - it still shows you when someone you've blocked posts a message or thread, and lets you click to read it. If you'd rather not see activity from users you've blocked at all, this extension is for you.
